name: Hyakkiyakou
summary:
This track is actually based on a Japanese folklore: Hyakkiyakou, which in English simply means "hundreds of ghosts go out at night".
So it's a kinda bit scary but funny as well.
I generally combined the Japanese traditional music with some sort of twerk/trap elements.
Realy hope you guys like it and enjoy this folklore :)
info:
• 中文名: 百鬼夜行
  • 发售日期: 2014-11-22
  • 碟片数量: 1
  • 艺术家: Anti-General
  • soundcloud: https://soundcloud.com/anti-general/hyakkiyakou
